about.title: Meet Antonio Silva
about.description:
Hi, I live in the state of Guanajuato in Mexico, I have an engineering degree in information technology from Universidad de la Salle Bajío. In the last 8 years I have worked as a hardware and software support technician for my local government. I also have knowledge of the English language at level B1.

I have worked in development of pages for: e-commerce, blog, landing pages, information consultation website, etc. Using technologies like: Javascript, React, Redux, NodeJS, PostgreSQL, Git, Github.

projects.title: My projects
projects.project1Description: Plan your exercise classes here, this website offers simplicity and clean design, prioritizes the user experience with responsive design, join us to fit easily and completely your body, do you accept the challenge?
projects.project2Description: FC Barcelona and world football news blog, has user authentication, CRUD of comments with the possibility of giving (like/dislike), saving information in the database, filtering by category/ID, conditional rendering, pagination, contact form, responsive design.
projects.project3Description: Focused sell sewing services/products, has user authentication with Auth0, payment gateway with mercadoPago, dark/light mode, combined filters, minimalist design, search by name, Local Storage, Dashboard admin, Reviews/score.
projects.project4Description: Return to pokemon world, You can consult, modify, delete and create pokemon, which are consumed through an external API and, in turn, are stored in a database. Made by a lover of this wonderful world.
